item.title: In Medium Detail: The Three Points to Practice in Engaging Thought of Awakening(2)
item.description: Previously, I discussed the concise way or the simplistic explanation of the thought of awakening.

item.title: Three Points to Practice in Engaging Thought of Awakening
item.description: Engaging in thoughts of awakening can be explained in three varying degrees of detail.

item.title: Training the Mind Towards Cultivating Thoughts of Awakening
item.description: Training the mind towards cultivating thoughts of awakening can be discussed under three main topics.
